remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必須是有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]根據形成[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格和[開放封裝慣例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)規格。`partUri` must be valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. 使用這個建構函式時組件不立即知道，且將稍後當呼叫。Use this constructor when the of the part is not immediately known and will be set later when is called. 根據預設，組件的屬性會初始化為。By default, the property of the part is initialized to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必須是有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]根據形成[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格和[開放封裝慣例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)規格。`partUri` must be valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. 根據預設，組件的屬性會初始化為。By default, the property of the part is initialized to . `contentType` 必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]根據以型別構成[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文字傳輸通訊協定為 HTTP*，區段 3.7。`contentType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表顯示內容的範例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]中所使用的型別[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|內容類型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字型Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 設定檔ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 影像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |模糊化的字型Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 影像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 影像TIFF image|tiff 影像 /image/tiff| |Windows Media Photo 影像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必須是有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]根據形成[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格和[開放封裝慣例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)規格。`partUri` must be valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. `contentType` 必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]根據以型別構成[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文字傳輸通訊協定為 HTTP*，區段 3.7。`contentType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表顯示內容的範例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]中所使用的型別[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|內容類型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字型Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 設定檔ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 影像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |模糊化的字型Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 影像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 影像TIFF image|tiff 影像 /image/tiff| |Windows Media Photo 影像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是唯讀屬性，可存取時，才父已開啟。 is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent is open. 屬性會由自動設定建構函式。The property is automatically set by the constructor. 設定建構函式之後,無法變更。After it is set by the constructor, the cannot be changed. 屬性是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]根據以型別構成[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文字傳輸通訊協定為 HTTP*，區段 3.7。The property is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表顯示內容的範例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]中所使用的型別[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|內容類型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字型Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 設定檔ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 影像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |模糊化的字型Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 影像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 影像TIFF image|tiff 影像 /image/tiff| |Windows Media Photo 影像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

summary.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

span.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件層關係定義這個組件的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 組件層級關聯性可以是兩種形式之一。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 來源之間到目標內。Between a source to a target inside the . - 來源封裝外部的目標資源。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在部分關聯性來源組件會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除來源組件時，會一併刪除組件所擁有的所有關聯性。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 建立或刪除關聯性的程序不會實際改變的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 方法不會實際變更來源組件，或目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 關聯性的目標不能是另一個關聯性。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 如需有關套件關聯性，請參閱下一節 1.3*開放封裝慣例 (OPC)* 規格可以從下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 如需 XPS 文件，請參閱*Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about XPS documents see the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件層關係定義這個組件的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 組件層級關聯性可以是兩種形式之一。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 來源之間到目標內。Between a source to a target inside the . - 來源封裝外部的目標資源。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在部分關聯性來源組件會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除來源組件時，會一併刪除組件所擁有的所有關聯性。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 建立或刪除關聯性的程序不會實際改變的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 方法不會實際變更來源組件，或目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 關聯性的目標不能是另一個關聯性。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 如果`targetMode`指定為，`targetUri`必須是相對 URI，構成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 內部的相對 URI 可以是任一個絕對路徑，開頭為正斜線 （"/"） 字元例如"/ page1.xaml"或"/ images/picture4.jpg"，或相對路徑，例如".../ imagespicture1.jpg 」 解析對封裝根目錄 （"/"） 作為基底 URI。The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI. 如果`targetMode`指定為，`targetUri`可以是任一個絕對或相對的 URI 格式，根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的泛型語法*規格。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 「http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml"是絕對 URI，參考外部目標資源 」 page2.xml 」 的範例。"http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml". 「 images/picture1.jpg"是相對 URI，也會參考外部目標資源 」 1.jpg 」 但可解析封裝本身的 uri 的範例。"images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself. `relationshipType` 必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，根據形成[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。`relationshipType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 不同的套件類型可以定義不同的組件層級關聯性類型。Different package types can define different part-level relationship types. 下表顯示組件層級`relationshipType`Uri 定義文件符合*Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)*。The following table shows the part-level `relationshipType` URIs defined for documents that conform to the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)*. |XPS 文件組件層級關聯性XPS Document Part-Level Relationship|URI 的關聯性類型Relationship Type URI| |-------------------------------------------|---------------------------| |數位簽章定義Digital Signature Definitions|[http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions](http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions)| Font|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/restricted-font| |StartPartStartPart|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/fixedrepresentation| |StoryFragmentsStoryFragments|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/storyfragments| 如需有關套件關聯性，請參閱下一節 1.3*開放封裝慣例 (OPC)* 規格可以從下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 如需 XPS 文件，請參閱*Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship (Uri targetUri, System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType, string id);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship(class System.Uri targetUri, valuetype System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType, string id) cil managed
public: System::IO::Packaging::PackageRelationship ^ CreateRelationship(Uri ^ targetUri, System::IO::Packaging::TargetMode targetMode, System::String ^ relationshipType, System::String ^ id);
member this.CreateRelationship : Uri * System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode * string * string -> System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship

param.name: targetUri
param.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target part.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target part.

param.name: targetMode
param.span: One of the enumeration values.

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

param.span: For example, if the target part is inside the ; or if the target is a resource outside the .

span.span: For example, if the target part is inside the ; or if the target is a resource outside the .

param.name: relationshipType
param.span: The role of the relationship.

span.span: The role of the relationship.

param.name: id
param.span: A unique ID for the relationship.

span.span: A unique ID for the relationship.

summary.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

span.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

returns.span: The part-level relationship between this to the target or external resource.

span.span: The part-level relationship between this to the target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件層關係定義這個組件的目標組件或資源之間的關聯。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 組件層級關聯性可以是兩種形式之一。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 來源之間到目標內。Between a source to a target inside the . - 來源封裝外部的目標資源。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在部分關聯性來源組件會被視為 「 擁有者 」 的關聯性。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 刪除來源組件時，會一併刪除組件所擁有的所有關聯性。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 建立或刪除關聯性的程序不會實際改變的目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. `id` 必須是有效的 XML 識別項。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id`型別是 xsd:ID，且必須遵照中所指定的命名慣例*XML 結構描述第 2 部分： Datatypes*規格 (請參閱[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)). 方法不會實際變更來源組件，或目標組件或以任何方式的資源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 關聯性的目標不能是另一個關聯性。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 如果`targetMode`指定為，`targetUri`必須是相對 URI，構成根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 內部的相對 URI 可以是任一個絕對路徑，開頭為正斜線 （"/"） 字元例如"/ page1.xaml"或"/ images/picture4.jpg"，或相對路徑，例如".../ imagespicture1.jpg 」 解析對封裝根目錄 （"/"） 作為基底 URI。The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI. 如果`targetMode`指定為，`targetUri`可以是任一個絕對或相對的 URI 格式，根據[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的泛型語法*規格。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 「http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml"是絕對 URI，參考外部目標資源 」 page2.xml 」 的範例。"http://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml". 「 images/picture1.jpg"是相對 URI，也會參考外部目標資源 」 1.jpg 」 但可解析封裝本身的 uri 的範例。"images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself. `relationshipType` 必須是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，根據形成[RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *統一資源識別元 (URI) 的一般語法*規格。`relationshipType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 不同的套件類型可以定義不同的組件層級關聯性類型。Different package types can define different part-level relationship types. 下表顯示組件層級`relationshipType`Uri 定義文件符合*Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)*。The following table shows the part-level `relationshipType` URIs defined for documents that conform to the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)*. |XPS 文件組件層級關聯性XPS Document Part-Level Relationship|URI 的關聯性類型Relationship Type URI| |-------------------------------------------|---------------------------| |數位簽章定義Digital Signature Definitions|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions| |DiscardControlDiscardControl|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/discard-control| |DocumentStructureDocumentStructure|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/documentstructure| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/printticket| |所需的資源Required Resource|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource| |受限制的字型Restricted Font|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/restricted-font| |StartPartStartPart|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/fixedrepresentation| |StoryFragmentsStoryFragments|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/storyfragments| 如需有關套件關聯性，請參閱下一節 1.3*開放封裝慣例 (OPC)* 規格可以從下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). 如需 XPS 文件，請參閱*Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)。For more information about XPS documents see the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `id` 必須是有效的 XML 識別項。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id`型別是 xsd:ID，且必須遵照中所指定的命名慣例*XML 結構描述第 2 部分： Datatypes*規格 (請參閱[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)). 如果指定`id`se neshoduje沒有關聯性會刪除任何此組件所擁有的關聯性，並擲回任何例外狀況。If the specified `id` does not match the for any of the relationships that are owned by this part, no relationship is deleted and no exception is thrown. 刪除指定的關聯性，以外方法不會實際變更這個組件或目標組件。Other than deleting the specified relationship, the method does not physically change either this part or the target part.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.

returns.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為虛擬方法的抽象基底類別。 is a virtual method of the abstract base class. 實作這個方法只能在建構時無法提供的內容類型值的衍生型別，或計算內容類型值是否為重要或高成本作業。Implement this method only in derived types where the value for the content type cannot be provided at the time of construction, or if calculating the content type value is a nontrivial or costly operation. 傳回的值必須是有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)]內容類型。The return value must be a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] content type. 在衍生的類別可以呼叫初始化設為預設值為衍生類別的屬性。Derived classes can call to initialize the property of the derived class to a default value. 之後屬性已設定它無法變更。After the property has been set it cannot be changed.

exception.span: The derived class does not provide an override implementation required for the method.

span.span: The derived class does not provide an override implementation required for the method.

summary.span: Returns the part content data stream.

span.para: 在內部呼叫衍生實際開啟，並傳回部分資料流的方法在衍生類別中實作的實體格式作為基礎。根據預設，子類別實作的抽象類別會提供和使用。在預設作業中，在內部呼叫的類別，以開啟，並傳回部分資料流從 ZIP 檔案。

internally calls the derived method to actually open and return the part data stream based on the physical format implemented in the derived class. By default, the subclass implementation of the abstract class is provided and used. In the default operation, internally calls of the class to open and return the part data stream from a ZIP file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式不應該呼叫直接，但應該改為呼叫。Applications should not call directly, but instead should call .

span.para: 衍生實作應該做出任何假設所執行作業的順序方法呼叫它。
The derived implementation should make no assumptions about the order or operations performed by the method that calls it.
衍生方法會呼叫實體衍生類別中實作的格式為基礎的方法，以開啟，並傳回部分資料流。根據預設，子類別實作的抽象類別會提供和使用。在預設作業中，在內部呼叫的類別，以開啟，並傳回部分資料流從 ZIP 檔案。

The derived method is called by the methods to open and return the part data stream based on the physical format implemented in the derived class. By default, the subclass implementation of the abstract class is provided and used. In the default operation, internally calls of the class to open and return the part data stream from a ZIP file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是唯讀屬性，可存取時，才父已開啟。 is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent is open. 屬性會由自動設定建構函式。The property is automatically set by the constructor. 它由建構函式，父設定之後無法變更組件。After it is set by the constructor, the parent for the part cannot be changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `id` 必須是有效的 XML 識別項。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id`型別是 xsd:ID，且必須遵照中所指定的命名慣例*XML 結構描述第 2 部分： Datatypes*規格 (請參閱[ https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID ](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID))。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)).
